settings.heading: Our On Site Services
settings.content: We begin by igniting inspiration. We offer guidance and bring results. Occasionally, you may simply require acoustic relief. However, we are also at your service for broader needs, such as fostering a collaborative team, promoting focused productivity, or establishing an unforgettable brand presence. From initial strategizing to the final implementation, experience the potential of transforming exceptional concepts into reality.

settings.code:
Our Green Pledge

At Soundbox, our dedication to sustainability, is at the heart of everything we do. We understand the importance of responsible manufacturing, and it's our mission to contribute positively to the environment. Our focus on creating environmentally-conscious office solutions ensures that each product not only enhances workspace acoustics but also reflects our commitment to a healthier planet.

settings.heading: We commence by instilling inspiration.
settings.content: We commence by instilling inspiration. Were available to personally consult each office new layout idea. This is how we ensure top-notch quality, considerate environmental impact, and scrutinise operational procedures. We extend the same level of diligence to the delivery process, employing intelligent logistics to transport goods to our warehouse and hubs. Additionally, we utilise both in-house and regional logistics within the UK, ensuring a seamless and efficient process.

settings.heading: Design & space planning
settings.content: Craft a workspace that amplifies your brand's productivity. Enhance teamwork and confidentiality, liberate additional room, and reintegrate remote staff into the office environment. And if you've yet to witness a client area transformed into a bar, or a conference room featuring a putting green, we have a couple more delightful surprises up our sleeves.

settings.heading: Project management
settings.content: When you relocate or revamp your office, get in touch with us. Our team will oversee all facets of planning and orchestrating your project with thoroughness, dedication – and adhering to stringent timelines. We go above and beyond the essentials, including the integration of acoustic booths, and are proficient in executing your design blueprint.

settings.heading: Eco-Conscious Packaging
settings.content: We believe in responsible packaging solutions. Our cardboard packaging is recyclable, and our plastic packaging is also recyclable, achieving a remarkable 95% recyclability rate.

settings.heading: PET Board from Recycled Plastic Bottles
settings.content: We proudly utilise PET boards made from recycled plastic bottles, transforming waste into a valuable resource while maintaining the highest standards of quality.

settings.heading: Recyclable Electrical Elements
settings.content: Our products incorporate electrical elements that are designed for optimal efficiency and are 90% recyclable, ensuring that even the technology we use aligns with our sustainability goals.

settings.heading: Nominal Materials
settings.content: Even the smaller components matter. Seals, foams, and other nominal materials are crafted to be 60% recyclable, reflecting our commitment to reducing waste across the board.

settings.heading: Our Team Bring You Consultation Services
settings.content: Our products are a testament to our eco-conscious approach. Every aspect of our manufacturing process is designed with sustainability in mind:

settings.code:
Your Green Future Begins with Soundbox Store

Soundbox isn't just the best acoustic booth supplier; we're champions of sustainability. Our products reflect our deep-seated commitment to creating eco-friendly office solutions without compromising on quality or innovation. Together, let's create a workplace that embodies both functionality and environmental responsibility. Experience the difference with Soundbox today, and be a part of the movement toward a greener tomorrow.

settings.title: Thinking Outside The Box, Inside The Booth
settings.text: Stay ahead of the curve by subscribing to our newsletter. Don't miss out on exciting events, product launches, meet and greets, and valuable upgrades. Join our community and be a part of the workspace revolution.

settings.code:
Certifications and Partnerships

Soundbox holds esteemed certifications that underscore our dedication to sustainability. These certifications highlight our dedication to environmentally responsible practices and emphasise our commitment to maintaining the highest levels of eco-friendliness in all our products.

settings.title: Are the electrical elements in your products eco-friendly?
settings.text: Yes, our products feature electrical elements that are designed with sustainability in mind. These elements are engineered to be energy-efficient and are composed of materials that are up to 90% recyclable, reducing the overall environmental impact.

settings.title: Do your products use plastic packaging?
settings.text: We are committed to minimising waste at every stage. Our packaging materials, including cardboard and plastic, are chosen for their recyclability. Our cardboard packaging is fully recyclable, and our plastic packaging boasts a remarkable 95% recyclability rate, helping to reduce waste in the packaging process.

settings.title: How do I dispose of my Soundbox product at the end of its lifecycle?
settings.text: When our products reach the end of their useful life, they can be disassembled, and their recyclable components can be separated and sent for recycling. This ensures that even after years of use, our products continue to contribute positively to the environment.

settings.title: Are your customisable products sustainable?
settings.text: Absolutely. We offer customisation options that allow you to tailor our products to your needs without compromising our sustainability principles. Our aim is to create bespoke solutions that align with both functionality and environmental responsibility.
